thread.title: Police officer shot dead in Chicago, manhunt under way
thread.title_full: Police officer shot dead in Chicago, manhunt under way | News24

author: news24.com
title: Police officer shot dead in Chicago, manhunt under way
text:
Washington - A police officer who was pursuing three suspects on foot in a Chicago suburb was shot and killed on Tuesday, news reports said.
A manhunt is under way in the suburb of Fox Lake, Illinois, just north of Chicago, for the three suspects, who were described as two white men and one black man.
The search involved canine units and helicopters searching from the air, Sergeant Chrisopher Covelli of the Lake County Illinois Sheriff's office said. A SWAT team also has been deployed, news reports said.
People who live in the suburb were told to stay home, and some schools were on lockdown.
